alert.note: Alert for Indian Wells Valley; Mojave Desert; Mojave Desert Slopes (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued September 20 at 6:50AM PDT until September 21 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...A WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM PDT THURSDAY AFTERNOON UNTIL 11 PM PDT THURSDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Sustained southwest winds 20 to 30 mph, with gusts near 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Kern County desert. * WHEN...From 2 PM PDT Thursday afternoon until 11 PM PDT Thursday evening. * IMPACTS...Blowing dust will reduce visibilities at times. Travel will be difficult, particularly for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Highways affected include, but are not limited to Highway 14, U.S. Highway 395, Highway 58 below Tehachapi Pass, and Highway 178 below Walker Pass. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. &&

area.areaDesc: Indian Wells Valley; Mojave Desert; Mojave Desert Slopes
